greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: When 2*n+1 first appears in A086799.
link: Michel Marcus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = 2*(n+1) - A006519(n+1) = n+1 with a 0 bit inserted above its least significant 1-bit. - _Kevin Ryde_, Mar 29 2021
maple: for i from 1 while count < N+1 do
if v <= N and V[v] = 0 then count:= count+1; V[v]:= i fi
program: a(n) = my(k=1); while (f(k) != 2*n+1, k++); k; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 07 2021
results.author: _Marc LeBrun_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 06 2021
